name: Fortuna (doup)
description:
Fortuna

Try your luck with the character given by Fortuna or "re-born" to try with another character. Depending on the character you'll have some unfair advantages and/or handicaps. Watch for the symbols on the map as they hint for better paths.

  • "Strong" ones can jump higher and run faster
  • "Males" can jump trough glass ceilings
  • The richer you are the more lives you get and the higher you start on the map
  • Your character might not be on the mood to jump
  • Watch out the bouncers, as the won't let you pass to certain areas

Avoid the black goo and jump hard to reach to the top!

Instructions
  • Use ⬅️ left and ➡️ right arrow keys to move
  • Press space to jump ⬆️
